profile.summary:
Ankur is a Senior Analyst passionate about various technologies associated with Data Engineering and a plumber in Data Science.
Data Extraction and Analytical Insight from Data is his platform of choice.

He has worked with the Global Data team in structured, unstructured, and semi-structured data helping clients gain insights into their data leveraging open source technologies like Apache Hadoop, Spark, Hive, and various components of the Bigdata framework.

Ankur is committed to lifelong learning and design-oriented development with problem-solving abilities keeping global customer-centric engagement in mind.

Technology Stack:
- Sound knowledge of Data Discovery, Building Analytics, and Insights from Scratch.
-Proficiency in Data Ingestion tools like Sqoop, Hive with good hold on Bigdata storage systems HDFS, Data Lake, S3, No-SQL Database, and Data Warehouse.
-Sound knowledge of Hadoop Framework with MapReduce and Processing Engine with PySpark.
-Always open for LINUX, UNIX environment with proficiency in Bash.
-Sound Knowledge of Cloud Technologies associated with Bigdata like EMR, AWS Glue, GCP Bigquerry, and Storage platforms S3 and GCS.

Project Management : 
- Passionate agile practitioner 
- Always open for multi-domain Global Team management.

member.occupation: Data Engineer - HSBC || Data Science Plumber || BITS Pilani

projects.description:
This project is on Big data Analytics - which deals with various B2B and B2C Data.
As a Ford Motor's data hub data gets ingested from various source and necessary transformation is being performed based on business requirements of stakeholders. Once data gets meaningful information and structured format Hub will supply the data to different Downstream depends on business need.
Technology Used -
Ingestion - Minio Bucket, SQL Server, Oracle, FTP/SFTP Server, Attinuty 
Transformation - Hive, Hadoop, HDFS, Spark, and Python 
Supply to Downstream - Alteryx, JDBC, ODBC, REST API
SDLC methodologies - Agile
projects.title: DataHub - Bring Valuable insights in Data

member.occupation: Data Engineer - HSBC || Data Science Plumber || BITS Pilani

projects.description:
This project describes Data analysis for various POC and development on Sentiment Analysis POC, where we leverage the AWS flexibility and platform.
Sentiment Analysis is developed using pre-existing NLP library form Standford NLP API and Google Voice to Text conversion API.
Analysis and R&D on Spark and AWS EMR data on the MDS(million-dollar song) data set where HD5 file is transformed and analysis on optimization on Spark job done as a Pre-sale POC product.

Tech Stack - AWS EMR, Ganglia, Spark, Hive, AWS RDS
projects.title: Sentiment with Bigdata Analysis
